student.name: Sarah Chen

creator.name: Marcus Rodriguez

professional.name: Dr. Emma Wilson

aiDetector.title: Bypass Every AI Detector
aiDetector.subtitle: Our advanced algorithms are specifically designed to pass all major AI detection tools. Your content will be undetectable and completely human-like.

pricingSection.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricingSection.subtitle: Get 1,000 words free on signup. Choose your plan.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Do you have any questions? We have got you covered.

howItWorks.question: How does Writelyy actually work?
howItWorks.answer: It's surprisingly simple! Just paste your AI-generated text into our editor or highlight text with our browser extension, then click "Humanize." Our advanced AI rewrites it to sound natural and human-like while keeping the original meaning intact. Takes under 2 seconds and works like magic!

bypassDetectors.question: Will this really bypass AI detectors?
bypassDetectors.answer: Absolutely! Our advanced humanization engine achieves a 99.9% success rate against all major AI detection tools including Turnitin, GPTZero, ZeroGPT, Originality.ai, and CopyLeaks. We use sophisticated algorithms that create natural human writing patterns these detectors simply cannot identify.

pricing.question: How much does it cost?
pricing.answer: Get 1,000 words free on signup! Our plans start at just $4.99/month for 15,000 words (Starter), $12.99/month for 75,000 words (Pro), or $24.99/month for unlimited words. No sneaky subscriptions or hidden fees. Cancel anytime. Your budget will love us.

privacy.question: Is my content safe and private?
privacy.answer: 100%! We don't store your text after processing, and everything is encrypted in transit. No one can see what you're rewriting. We're not logging your content or selling your data. Your privacy is sacred to us.

features.question: What advanced features do you offer?
features.answer: We offer multiple writing tones, context management for consistent projects, team collaboration features, unlimited grammar checks, fast processing mode, and support for 50+ languages. Pro and Unlimited plans include advanced humanization engines and higher word limits per request.

academic.question: Can I use this for academic writing?
academic.answer: Absolutely! Our Academic tone and advanced humanization engine are specifically designed for scholarly writing. With up to 3,000 words per request and guaranteed bypass of academic AI detectors like Turnitin, it's perfect for essays, research papers, and dissertations while maintaining academic integrity.

installation.question: Do I need to install anything?
installation.answer: Nope! You can use our web editor instantly - just copy, paste, and humanize. Want even more convenience? Install our optional browser extension to rewrite text directly in Google Docs, Gmail, Notion, or any text field. Both work perfectly!

guarantee.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the results?
guarantee.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. If you're not happy with Writelyy, just contact our support team within 30 days for a full refund. No questions asked, no hassle. We're that confident you'll love it!
